resources.string: By signing up for Luv.ly, you agree to our Terms of Service. Learn how we process your data in our Privacy Policy
We need to verify your account, and exclusively for that reason. It will never be shown on your profile
We have sent a verification code to
Provide us your real name to identify you correctly, your name will be visible to others
We need your date of birth so we can personalize the data as per age-group ☺️
The photo in your profile must be a picture of you.
